definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: daughter (= …[[בַּנְתְּ ]] fr. [[בן]]; Ph. [[בת]], MI [[בנת]] pl. maidens, As. bintu Winckler:Sargon, Gloss., Ar. bintun; Sab. [[בת]], [[בנת]] DHM:ZMG 1883, 391 CIS:iv. l, No. 6. 21; Aram. bart)—´[[ב]] abs. Ex 1:16 +; cstr. Ge 11:29 +; sf. [[בִּתִּי]] De 22:16 +; [[בִּתְּךָ]] Ge 29:18 +; [[בִּתֵּנוּ]] Ge 34:17 etc.; pl. [[בָּנוֹת]] Ge 5:4 +; cstr. [[בְּנוֹת]] Ge 6:2 +; sf. [[בְּנׁתַי]] Ge 31:26+; [[בְּנוֹתֶיךָ]] Ge 19:12 +; [[בְּנׁתָם]] Ge 34:21; [[בְּנוֹתֵיהֶם]] De 12:31 +, etc.;—

daughter, female child, born of a woman Ge 30:21, Ge 34:1, Ex 1:16, Ex 1:22, Ex 21:4, Le 12:6, Ho 1:6, cf. Ge 20:12, Le 18:9, De 27:22 +; begotten by a man Ge 5:4, Ge 5:7, Ge 5:10, Ge 11:11, Ge 11:13, Ge 11:15 cf. Ge 11:29, Ge 19:8, Ge 20:12, Ge 28:2, Le 19:9, De 27:22 +; oft. ‖[[בֵּן]] son Ge 5:4; Ge 5:7 + (v. [[בֵּן]]); cf. in allegory of Jehoash 2Ki 14:9 = 2Ch 25:18; note esp. [[בְּנוֹת]] [[הָאָדָם]] i.e. human women Ge 6:2, Ge 6:4; [[בִּתְּךָ הַפְּטַנׇּה]] thy younger daughter Ge 29:18 (cf. [[הַצְּעִירָה]] v:Ge 29:26 opp. [[הַבְּכִירָה]]); [[בִּתִּי הַגְּדוֹלָה]] my eldest daughter 1Sa 18:17; [[מֶּלֶךְ]]([[הַ]])[[בַּת־]] = princess 2Ch 22:11, 2Ki 9:34, Da 11:6 cf. 2Sa 13:18, Je 41:10, Je 43:6, Ps 45:10; cf. as term of praise [[בַּת־נׇדִיב]] Ct So 7:2; in partic. †

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: girl called [[בִּתֵּנוּ]] by father and brothers Ge 34:17 cf. [[בִּתְּכֶם]] v:Ge 34:8. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of adopted daughter Es 2:7, Es 2:15. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: used in speaking to daughter-in-law Ru 1:11, Ru 1:12, Ru 1:13, Ru 2:2, Ru 2:8, Ru 2:22, Ru 3:1, Ru 3:16, Ru 3:18. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[בַּת־אָבִיו]] = sister Ez Eze 22:11 (appos. [[אחזתו]]); also half-sister Ge 20:12 [[בַּת־אָבִי אַךְ לאׁ בַת־אִמִּי]], cf. Le 18:9 & v:Le 18:11 [[בַּת־אֵשֶׁת אָבִיךָ]], Le 20:17. †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: used in kindly address, [[בִּתִּי]] Ru 3:10, Ru 3:11 (Boaz to Ruth), cf. Ps 45:11; [[בְּנוֹתַי]] in mouth of ´[[י]] Is 43:6 (‖[[בָּנַי]]). †

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: [[בְּנוֹת בָּנׇיו]] = granddaughters Ge 46:7 (P) cf. Le 18:10 & v:Le 18:17 (H); note also Ge 37:35, where [[בנותיו]] must include other than actual daughters.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: [[רִבְקָה]] [[בַּת־בְּתוּאֵל]] (as more precise designation) Ge 25:20 cf. Ge 24:23, Ge 24:24, Ge 24:47, Ge 24:47 also Ge 26:34, Ge 26:34, Ge 29:10 +; note esp. † [[בַּת־]] [[פַּרְעׂה]] (without personal name) Ex 2:5, Ex 2:7, Ex 2:8, Ex 2:9, Ex 2:10 cf. 1Ki 3:1, 1Ki 7:8, 1Ki 9:24, 1Ki 11:1, 2Ch 8:11; [[בַּת־אִישׁ כְּנַעֲנִי וּשְׁמוֹ שׁוּעַ]] Ge 38:2 cf. v:Ge 38:12 (but cf. 1Ch 2:3 sub [[בַּת־שׁוּעַ]]

young women, women Ge 30:13 (J) Pr 31:29, Ct So 2:2, So 6:9; [[בָּנוֹת בּׂטְחוֹת]] Is 32:9; also [[בַּת]] [[הַנׇּשִׁים]] Da 11:17. †

pl. = villages, after name of city, [[וּבְחֶשְׁבּוֹן וּבְכָל־בְּנׁתֶיהָ]] Nu 21:25 cf. v:Nu 21:32, Nu 32:42 (E) Jos 15:45, Jos 15:47, Jos 15:47 (JE ?) + v:Jos 15:28 LXX Di, Jos 17:11 (6 t.) v:Jos 17:16 (J) = Ju Jdg 1:27, Jdg 1:27, Jdg 1:27, Jdg 1:27, Jdg 11:26, Jdg 11:26, Je 49:2 + 17 t. Ch + 6 t. Ne 11:25-31. On 1Ch 18:1 & its variation from ‖ 2Sa 8:1 vid. We Dr.

in phrases denoting character, quality, etc., [[בַּת־אֵל נֵכָר]] daughter of a strange god, i.e. idolatrous (woman or people) Mal 2:11; [[בַּת־גְּדוּר]] daughter of a troop, i.e. war-like city Mic 4:14; [[בְּנוֹת הַשִּׁיר]] Ec 12:4 the daughters of song, i.e. songs, melodious notes; [[בַּת־בְּלִיַּעַל]] 1Sa 1:16 v. [[בְּלִיַּעַל]] sub [[בלה]]. †

[[בַּת יַעֲנׇה]] = ostrich Le 11:16 = De 14:15; pl. [[בְּנוֹת יַעֲנׇה]] Job 30:29, Mic 1:8, Is 13:21, Is 34:13, Is 43:20, Je 50:39 (v. [[יַעֲנׇה]]); [[בַּת־עַיִן]] pupil of the eye La 2:18 cf. Eth. bnta: 9ayn: v. also [[אישׁוֹן]] †
fig. [[לַעֲלוּקָה שְׁתֵּי בָנוֹת]] Pr 30:15 two daughters (i.e. Shₑ’ôl & the barren womb, cf. Comm.) †
of vine = branch [[בָּנוֹת חָֽעֲרָה עֲלֵי־שׁוּר]] Ge 49:22 cf. Di & v: sub [[בֵּן]]. †
as n. relat. (all P), of age of woman [[בַּת־תִּשְׁעִים שָׁנׇה]] Ge 17:17; of ewe-lamb [[בַּת־שְׁנׇתָהּ]] Le 14:10, Nu 6:14; of she-goat id. Nu 15:27. Cf. [[בֵּן]]
